message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $1,400,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,300,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $1,300,000 is a tempting offer, I believe this product's true value is closer to my initial price. Could you consider $1,375,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,350,000. Can we meet in the middle?
